overview: Daniel Koukal is driving along a Prague street when his car breaks down. When you're as cute as Daniel, that's no problem! Naturally, a guy in a red car hits his brakes, and before you know it, he is towing Koukal and his car back to a greasy garage. In the great Studio 2000 tradition of Grease Gum, we don't have to tell you that said garage is full of gorgeous well-greased guys, who know what to do with a tool when they see one!
title: Sextrap
